name: Clandestine (itch)
description: People will pay top dollar for government secrets in the Black Market. So, spies work night and day to find a way to get into the United Nations but, security is always too tight. Every year the United Nations holds an annual gala, security becomes much more relaxed so, spies take advantage of this opportunity.  This night has flustered the head security every year because spies have stolen information with ease. But, this year there’s a new head of security and he’s determined to find and eliminate the spy.
